thread.title: Watch: Tim Spiers' 60-second Wolves update - October 8
thread.title_full: Watch: Tim Spiers' 60-second Wolves update - October 8

title: Watch: Tim Spiers' 60-second Wolves update - October 8
text:
PUBLISHED: October 8, 2015 8:05 am LAST UPDATED: October 8, 2015 3:54 pm Watch: Tim Spiers' 60-second Wolves update - October 8 Wolves correspondent Tim Spiers discusses how the up-for-sale club have already built for a bright future through their academy. Tweet 
Owner Steve Morgan’s multi-million pound investment in Compton Park has made their youngsters' training base a Category One facility. 
The rewards on the pitch are already clear to see - Danny Batth, Jack Price and Dominic Iorfa are currently in the first-team. 
Carl Ikeme, Bright Enobakhare and Ethan Ebanks-Landell, plus Matt Doherty and Kortney Hause, who joined the club in their late teens, have also featured this season. More on this story:
